title: Pixel 4 XL shuts down a few seconds after I start it, battery stuck at 50%
content:
1. I bought my Pixel 4 XL on November 9, 2019 on the German Google Store.
2. Around September 2020, I noticed that the battery indicator sometimes got stuck at 50%.
3. By October 2020, the phone started shutting down unexpectedly.
4. Now, if I power on my Pixel 4 XL the Google logo appears but after a few seconds the phone dies.
5. If I firmly hold the bottom left and right corners while powering on the phone, I can get it to stay on until I reach the home screen. I need to apply a significant amount of pressure for this method to work though.

I would like to get my phone repaired under warranty. Unfortunately, it seems that you cannot request phone or chat support for the Pixel right now, see:
- https://support.google.com/pixelphone?p=pixel_call&hl=de-DE
- https://support.google.com/pixelphone?p=pixel_chat&hl=de-DE

How can I place a repair request?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
